title: Kilerpoyo's Spooky Skeletons
content:
[[include :scp-wiki:theme:black-highlighter-theme]]
[[include :scp-wiki:theme:old-money-theme]]
[[include :scp-wiki:theme:dia-de-muertos]]

[[>]]
[[module Rate]]
[[/>]]

@@ @@

[[=image 6755 width="550em"]]

@@ @@

[[div class="blockquote"]]
[[=]]
[*https://scp-wiki.wikidot.com/scp-6755 SCP-6755] aka "A Promise to the Pale Lady" 
@@ @@
//...to be Death you have to learn how to enjoy Life. Otherwise, this work will kill you...//
[[/=]]
[[/div]]

@@ @@

[[=image 5381 width="550em"]]

@@ @@

[[div class="blockquote"]]
[[=]]
[*https://scp-wiki.wikidot.com/scp-5381 SCP-5381] aka "Gashadokuro de AzÃºcar" 
@@ @@
//I was left alone again, contemplating the starry night, wondering if I would live to see the day the Rising Sun and the Navel of the Moon finally shine together.//
[[/=]]
[[/div]]

@@ @@

[[=image 7279 width="550em"]]

@@ @@

[[div class="blockquote"]]
[[=]]
[*https://scp-wiki.wikidot.com/scp-7279 SCP-7279] aka "Tzompantli" 
@@ @@
//Padre nuestro que estas en los cielos.//
//Padre nuestro que estas en los suelos.//
//You gave me life once; it is my time to return the favor.//
[[/=]]
[[/div]]

@@ @@

[[=image 7503 width="550em"]]

@@ @@

[[div class="blockquote"]]
[[=]]
[*https://scp-wiki.wikidot.com/scp-7503 SCP-7503] aka "Sacrum Humanum Imperium" 
@@ @@
//And yet, after all these cycles, you still find yourself screaming in terror into that void where no one would ever answer you. No one but me. For I am the voice of one calling in the wilderness. I am the alpha and the omega.//
[[/=]]
[[/div]]

@@ @@
